roleset.name: not be prompt, dally
roleset.note: PROCRASTINATE-V NOTES: Added by Kevin (from procrastinate.01-v)

example.name: Politics
example.text: Governments procrastinated for days over whether or not to place sanctions on the small country.
example.arg: over whether or not to place sanctions on the small country

example.name: Intransitive
example.text: Winston procrastinated a lot due to his nervous demeanor.
